dsense.name: one-off
dsense.guideword: mainly UK, informal ([sth] done once only) (非正式用语)

example.eg: The song was a one-off and the group never produced another hit.
example.egtrans: 那首歌只是昙花一现，其乐队再也没能推出其他的热门歌曲。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一次性事件, 昙花一现

example.eg: I had a one-off chance to hear Sixto Rodriguez sing.

dsense.name: let one off, let one go

example.eg: Did you just let one off?
